lead_paragraph: Pakistan's opening batsman Azhar Ali has rarely seemed a man in a hurry in six years of test cricket so it was fitting that his 12th century was eked out in fits and starts over two rainy days at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.

headline.print_headline: Azhar Becomes the Man for All Seasons at Rainy MCG
headline.main: Azhar Becomes the Man for All Seasons at Rainy MCG

snippet: Pakistan's opening batsman Azhar Ali has rarely seemed a man in a hurry in six years of test cricket so it was fitting that his 12th century was eked out in fits and starts over two rainy days at the Melbourne Cricket Ground....
